title: ‘The Devil in Me’ feels like a dead end for The Dark Pictures Anthology
description: For as good as Supermassive is at making choose-your-own-horror-adventure games, it continues to feel like the developer is boxed in by its chosen format.

title: NASA’s Orion spacecraft reaches the moon, flying 81 miles above the surface
description: The passage over the moon came five days after Orion was launched from the Kennedy Space Center.

title: The long, lonely wait to recover a hacked Facebook account
description: Victims said customer support does next to nothing as users lose time and money.

title: This World Cup is wired and fueled by AI
description: At the 2022 World Cup, everything from stadium temperatures to the soccer balls are run on sensors and algorithms.
